Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe ekungumkweletisi ohlelekile ({formal credit provider})?
Explanation: Abakweletisi abahlelekile - kanjengama {bank}, izikhungo zezikweletu, kanye nezitolo - banikana izikweletu ezidinga ukuthi u aplaye ngokubheka ukuthi ungakhona yini ukukhokha

Question content: Noma ngubani oqala ibhizinisi lokukweletisa uba ngumkweletisi osemthethweni?
Explanation: Ngokomthetho, abakweletisi badinga uku aplayela ukurejista kuyi {National Credit Regulator} ({NCR}) futhi belandele izinqumo eziqinile zomthetho

Question content: Abakweletisi abahlelekile kumele belandele imithetho yokukweletisa eqinile
Explanation: Isikweletu esihlelekile isikweletu onikwa sona yi {registered credit provider} njenge bhange, ehlelwa ngemithetho ehambiselana ne {National Credit Regulator} ({NCR})

Question content: Iyiphi kulezi ehlobene nokukweletisa okuhlelekile?
Explanation: Izikweletu ezihlelekile zidinga ukuthi u aplaye ngokuhleliwe, kubhekwe ukuthi ungakhona yini ukuzikhokhela, bese uyanikwa noma cha leso siskweletu ngokukhona kwakho ukusikhokhela

Question content: Ungakasitholi isikweletu, kumele abakweletisi abahlelekile benze ini?
Explanation: Abakweletisi abahlelekile bakudinga ukuthi u aplayele isikweletu kuze bezobona ukukweletiseleka kwakho. Ngamanye amazwi, ukuthi ungakhona yini ukukhokha

Question content: Abakweletisi abahlelekile bakwenza u aplaye ukuthola isikweletu kwenze njani?
Explanation: Uku aplayela isikweletu kulungele umkweletisi nomuboleki ngoba bavikela wena oboleka imali ukuthi ungashaywa yizikwetu kanye nomkweletisi ukuthi i{risk} yomkweletisi ibe ncane

Question content: Ngemuva kokuthola isikweletu uma u aplayile ngokomthetho, udinga ini?
Explanation: Kuze uthole isikweletu osi aplayele, kumele ube se {South Africa} ngokomthetho, kumele ukhone ukukhokhela isikweletu futhi ube negama elihle ekukweleteni imali

Question content: Abakweletisi abasebenza ngokomthetho benza u aplayele isikweletu ngoba abafuni ukukunikeza imali
Explanation: Uku aplayela isikweletu kuvikela abakweletisi ekulahlekelweni imali abayibolekisayo, kanti futhi kuvikela okweletayo ukuthi engabi nezikweletu ezingakhonakali (ungabi {over-indebted})

Question content: Isikweletu esihlelekile sithatha isikhathi eside kunesikweletu esingahlelekile
Explanation: Ngokuthuthuka kobuchwepheshe, ukukweleta imali kuya ngokuya kuyashesha. Uma unikwa isikweletu, uyakhona ukusithatha ngalowo mzuzu

Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe ekuyisivumelwano somthetho phakathi kwakho nomkweletisi?
Explanation: Isivumelwano esihlelekile isivumelwano somthetho la enivumelana khona ngokombhalo, la ovuma khona ukukhokha imali oyikweletayo ngemigomo yomkweletisi

Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe eyisivumelwano sesikweletu?
Explanation: Izindawo zokukweletisa (ama {credit card}, izitolo nama {account}), ukuthengiswa kwezimoto ngesikweletu, kanye nokuthenga indlu ngebhange noma nge {home loan} izinhlobo ezahlukile zesivumelwano sesikweletu

Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe eyisivumelwano sesikweletu esihlelekile?
Explanation: i{Personal loan}, ukuthenga indlu ngebhange noma nge {home loan} noma la obambisa khona isikweletu ngempahla yakho ({pawn transaction}) izinhlobo ezahlukile zezivumelwane zesikweletu

Question content: Uma u{sign}a isikweletu sesivumelwano, kumele ukhokhele ngokomthetho yonke imali yenani lesikweletu
Explanation: Uma u{sign}a isivumelwano sesikweletu, umele ukusikhokhela sonke isikweletu ngokomthetho - okuyi mali oyibolekile nezinzalo zakhona nezimali zokuboleka

Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe ekuyisibonelo sesivumelwano sesikweletu esisemthethweni?
Explanation: Uma uvula i{account} esitolo esithembhekile, ungena esivumelwaneni sesikweletu esihlelekile. Uzoshajelwa izinto ozithengile ngendlela yemali encane ongayikhokha ({minimum payment})

Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe engathintani nesivumelwano sesikweletu?
Explanation: Ukuqasha indawo yokuhlala akusiso isikweletu ngoba ekupheleni kokuhlala kwakho khona akubi ngeyakho indawo. Ihlala ingeyomnikazi wayo.

Question content: i{Account} ongalokhu uthatha kuyo imali ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Revolving credit} iyisikweletu la ongathatha uthathile esikweletini kuze kufike enanini elithile. Ama {credit card} nama {account} ezitolo ayi {revolving credit}

Question content: Isikweletu ongalokhu uthatha kuso kuze kufike esibalweni esithile sibizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Revolving credit} iyisikweletu la ongathatha uthathile esikweletini kuze kufike enanini elithile ube ukhokha imali ekuyi {minimum}

Question content: Iyiphi kulezi ekuyintengo ye {revolving credit}?
Explanation: Imali oyitholayo kuyi {credit card} ibizwa ngokuthi i{revolving} ngoba uyayiboleka uyikhokhe bese uyayiboleka futhi. Lokhu kwenzeka uze uqede noma uvale leso sikweletu

Question content: Iyiphi kulezi ekuyintengo ye {revolving credit}?
Explanation: Imali oyitholayo kuyi {credit card} ibizwa ngokuthi i{revolving} ngoba uyayiboleka uyikhokhe bese uyayiboleka futhi. Lokhu kwenzeka uze uqede noma uvale leso sikweletu

Question content: Imali oyikweletayo kuyi {revolving credit} ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Imali oyikweletayo kumkweletisi ibizwa nge bhalansi ({balance}). Uma ukweleta R100 kuyi {credit card} bese ukhokha u R50, ibhalasi eshodayo ({outstanding balance}) ngu R50 kanye nenzala oshajwa yona

Question content: Saziwa ngani isibalo semali ongekhone ukweqa kuso ngokuboleka esikweletini?
Explanation: Isikweletu esi {revolving} sinemali ongekwazi ukuyeqa ngokuboleka ({maximum limit}) - uma into ibiza R12000 kodwa i{limit} yakho kungu R10000, angeke ukwazi ukuyikhokhela yonke ngaleso sikweletu

Question content: Hlobo luni lwesikweletu i{credit card} nama {account} ezitolo?
Explanation: i{Revolving credit} iyisikweletu la ongathatha uthathile esikweletini kuze kufike enanini elithile ({maximum limit}). Ama {credit card} nama {account} ezitolo angama {revolving credit}

Question content: Ithatha isikhathi esingakanani i{revolving credit}?
Explanation: Asikho isiphetho se {revolving credit} esibekiwe. Uma usakhokha imali ebekiwe ekuyi {minimum} noma ngaphezu, isikweletu sisavuliwe. Kumele usikhokhele sonke kuze uzosivala

Question content: Kuyeneza yini ungakhokhi nzalo nge {revolving credit}?
Explanation: Nge {revolving credit} inzalo ibalwa emalini eshodayo ekuyi {balance} njalo ngenyanga. Uma ungakweleti mali ngosuku lokushaja inzalo, awukhokhi nzalo

Question content: i{Revolving credit} ijwayele ukusetshenziselwa ukuthenga izinto kanjengezimpahla nezinto zasendlini
Explanation: Ngokwenjwayelo, i{revolving credit} eyokuthenga ezitolo kanje. Akuyona eyokukhookhela izinto ezinkulu kanje ngemoto noma indlu ngoba 1) iyabiza inzalo kanti futhi 2) i{limit} yesikweletu incance

Question content: i{Revolving credit} ijwayele ukusetshenziselwa izinto ezinkulu kanjenge moto nendlu
Explanation: Ngokwenjwayelo, i{revolving credit} eyokuthenga ezitolo kanje. Akuyona eyokukhookhela izinto ezinkulu kanje ngemoto noma indlu ngoba 1) iyabiza inzalo kanti futhi 2) i{limit} yesikweletu incance

Question content: Hlobo luni lwesivumelwano sesikweletu i{account} yesitolo sezimpahla?
Explanation: Isikweletu esibizwa nge {revolving credit} isikweletu ositholayo kuyi {account} yezimpahla zokugqoka. Uyasisebenzisa, usikhokhele, usisebenzise futhi ngokubona. Kumele usikhokhele sonke kuze uzosivala

Question content: Izitolo zijwayele ukunika isikweletu se {revolving credit} esihlobo luni?
Explanation: Uma usebenzisa ikhadi elihlangene nesitolo ukuthenga izimpahla noma izinto zasendlini ngokwesibonelo, usebenzisa uhlobo lwe sikweletu ekuyi {revolving credit}

Question content: Kuze uzokwazi ukugcina i{account} yesitolo imi kahle ngokwezimali, udinga ukwenza ini?
Explanation: Awudingi ukukhokha yonke imali oyikweletayo esitolo ukuze ube negama elihle. Kumele ukhokhe imali elingana noma engaphezu kwe {minimum} yenyanga, okungenzeka nge {debit order}

Question content: Kuze uzothola i{account} yasesitolo, kumele wenze ini kuqala?
Explanation: Izitolo kumele zibheke ukukhona kwakho ukukhokha izikweletu kuze zizokunika i{account}. Ngokujwayelekile, uzofunwa i{ID}, izitatmende zase {bank}, kanye ne {payslip}

Question content: Ngaphezu kwenzalo, iyiphi imali oshajwa yona esitolo one {account} kuso?
Explanation: Uma uthenga ngesikweletu, kuzomele ubuyisele yonke imali oyikweletile. Yonke inyanga edlula ungayikhokhile ungashajwa inzalo kanye nezimali zesevisi kwesinye isikhathi

Question content: Ngaphezu kwemali oyisebenzisayo, yini enye abakushajela yona esitolo sezimpahla?
Explanation: Yenza isiqiniseko ukuthi uyasizwa kahle isivumelwano nokuthi uyavumelana naso ungakavuli i{account}. Ngale kwenzalo, kungaba khona ezinye izimali zama sevisi nezijeziso uma ungakhokhanga ngesikhathi

Question content: Uma usebenzisa i{account} yasesitolo okokuqala, ungena esivumelwaneni sesikweletu
Explanation: Ungashajwa inzalo emalini oyikweletayo kuyi {account} uma kukhona imali oyikweletayo. Awushajwa lutho uma uhlale ukhokha imali oyisebenzisile masishane kungakafiki isikhathi senzalo

Question content: Awushajwa inzalo uma uthenga izimplahla nge {account} yasesitolo
Explanation: Nge{account} yasesitolo, inzalo yesikweletu ishajwa emalini oyikweletayo ekuyi bhalansi ({balance}) njalo ngenyanga ngokujwayelekile. Uma ukweleta kakhulu uzokhokha inzalo eningi

Question content: Uyashajwa yini inzalo uma uthenga izinto nge{account} yasesitolo?
Explanation: Nge{account} yasesitolo, inzalo yesikweletu ishajwa emalini oyikweletayo ekuyi bhalansi ({balance}) njalo ngenyanga ngokujwayelekile. Uma ukweleta kakhulu uzokhokha inzalo eningi

Question content: Ama{credit card} ayisivumelwano sesikweletu esinjani?
Explanation: Isikweletu osithola nge {credit card} si {revolving} okusho ukuthi uyasisebenzisa ube usikhokhela ube usisebenzisa. Lokhu kuyaqhubeka uze ukhokhe yonke imali uvale i{account}

Question content: Ama {bank} anike ama {customer} awo uhlobo le {revolving credit} olwaziwa ngokuthini?
Explanation: Uma usebenzisa i{credit card} (ehlangene ne {account} yesikweletu) ukukhokhela izinto emoyeni, usebenzisa uhlobo le {revolving credit}

Question content: Kuze uzoba negama elihle, kumele wenze ini?
Explanation: Awudingi ukukhokha yonke imali oyikweletayo kuyi {credit card} kuze uzoma kahle nayo. Kodwa umele ukukhokha imali elingana noma engaphezu kwe {limit} abathi ikhokhe

Question content: Ungenza ini kuze ungeke ukhokhe inzalo kuyi {credit card}?
Explanation: Kuma {credit card} inzalo ishajwa emalini eshodayo ({balance}) kanye ngenyanga. Uma ukhokha yonke imali yesikweletu lungakafiki lolo suku, awukhokhi nzalo

Question content: Uma unemali {{encane}} eshodayo kuyi {credit card} ukhokha {{inzalo eningi}}
Explanation: Kuma {credit card} inzalo ishajwa emalini eshodayo ({balance}) kanye ngenyanga. Uma i{balance} yakho inkulu, inzalo yakho izoba nkulu

Question content: Kunyenzeka yini ukuthi usebenzise i{credit card} kodwa ungakhokhi nzalo?
Explanation: Kuma {credit card} inzalo ishajwa emalini eshodayo ({balance}) ngenyanga. Uma ukhokha yonke imali yesikweletu lungakafiki lolo suku lokushaja, awukhokhi nzalo

Question content: Uma usebenzisa i{credit card} okokuqala, ungena esivumelwaneni sesikweletu
Explanation: Ama {credit card} aluhlobo lesivumelwano sesikweletu esi {revolving}. Uma kunemali osayikweletayo khona, uzokhokha inzalo kuyo futhi kumele uyikhokhe nayo leyo mali

Question content: Iyiphi kulezi ezibaliwe ekuyi {account} esetshenziselwa amaholo, ukukhokha kanye nama {overdraft}?
Explanation: i{Cheque account} i{account} la iholo lingena khona, futhi la okhokhela khona izinto khona. Ayahluka ama {cheque} kuma {saving account} ngoba i{savings} ayinayo i{overdraft}

Question content: Iyiphi i{account} kwezibaliwe ehamba ne {overdraft}?
Explanation: Awukwazi ukusebenzisa imali engaphezulu kwemali engeyakho ({overdraft}) kuyi {savings account}. i{Overdraft} isho ukuthi ungakhipha imali kuyi {cheque account} ngisho ungenamali esele

Question content: Ama{{overdraft}} ajwayele ukuhamba ne {{cheque account}}
Explanation: Awukwazi ukusebenzisa imali engaphezulu kwemali engeyakho ({overdraft}) kuyi {savings account}. i{Overdraft} isho ukuthi ungakhipha imali kuyi {cheque account} ngisho ungenamali esele

Question content: Iyakwazi yini i{savings account} (ekuyi la obeka khona imali) ukuba ne {overdraft}?
Explanation: Awukwazi ukusebenzisa imali engaphezulu kwemali engeyakho ({overdraft}) kuyi {savings account}. i{Overdraft} isho ukuthi ungakhipha imali kuyi {cheque account} ngisho ungenamali esele

Question content: Isivumelwano sesikweletu la okwazi khona ukungena esibalweni se {account} esingu {minus} ({{negative}}) sibizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Overdraft} uhlobo lwesikweletu kuyi {cheque account} la ongakhipha khona imali kuyi {account} ngisho ungenamali kuyo (i{account} ingena esibalweni esingaphansi kuka {zero} ekuyi {negative balance})

Question content: Uma i{cheque account} yakho ikwazi ukungena esibalweni esingu {minus}, kusho ukuthi ihambha ne__________
Explanation: i{Overdraft} uhlobo lwesikweletu kuyi {cheque account} la ongakhipha khona imali kuyi {account} ngisho ungenamali kuyo (i{account} ingena esibalweni esingaphansi kuka {zero} ekuyi {negative balance})

Question content: Uma i{account} yakho ingena ku {minus}, kuthiwa injani?
Explanation: i{Overdraft} ingena uma usebenzisa imali kuyi account yize ungenayo. Uma uyisebenzisa i{account} ingenamali, iba ne {balance} eyimali oyisebenzisile ngaphansi kuka {zero} ({minus})

Question content: Yini kwezibaliwe eyenza ukwazi ukusebenzisa imali engaphezulu kwemali onayo kuyi {account}?
Explanation: i{Overdraft} imali yesikweletu kuyi {cheque account} oyisebenzisa yize ungenayo. Ekuyisebenziseni, iba ne {balance} eyimali engaphansi kuka {zero (minus}) kuze kufike kuyi {limit}

Question content: i{Overdraft} ingena uma imali kuyi {account} yakho iba ngaphansi kuka {zero}
Explanation: i{Overdraft} imali yesikweletu kuyi {cheque account} oyisebenzisa yize ungenayo. Ekuyisebenziseni, iba ne {balance} eyimali engaphansi kuka {zero (minus}) kuze kufike kuyi {limit}

Question content: i{Overdraft} yenza ukwazi ukusebenzisa imali engaphezulu kwale onayo kuyi {account}
Explanation: i{Overdraft} imali yesikweletu kuyi {cheque account} oyisebenzisa yize ungenayo. Ekuyisebenziseni, iba ne {balance} eyimali engaphansi kuka {zero} ({minus}) oyikweletayo

Question content: i{Overdraft} iyazingenela uma imali kuyi {account} yakho yehla ngaphansi kuka {zero}
Explanation: i{Overdraft} imali yesikweletu kuyi {cheque account} oyisebenzisa yize ungenayo. Ekuyisebenziseni, iba ne {balance} eyimali engaphansi kuka {zero} ({minus}) kuze kufike kuyi {limit}

Question content: Njalo uma usebenzisa i{overdraft} uboleka imali
Explanation: Uma usebenzisa imali ye {overdraft}, ungena esikweletini ngokungena esibalweni semali yakho engu {minus} kuyi {cheque account}. Kumele lemali uyibuyisele

Question content: Kuyicebo elihlakaniphile ukusebenzisa i{overdraft} njalo ngenyanga
Explanation: i{Overdraft} ifana nezinye izikweletu, iyaba usizo. Kodwa ukuyisebenzisa njalo ngenyanga khona uzophila kusho ukuthi usezikweletini kakhulu  okusho ukuthi ungaba {over}-{indebted}

Question content: Ingabe wonke umuntu one {cheque account} engaba nayo i{overdraft} na?
Explanation: i{Overdraft} uhlobo lesivumelwano sesikweletu esihlelekile, okusho ukuthi kumele usikhone. Ungayi aplayela i{overdraft}, kodwa i{bank} lingakunika unga aplayanga, uma uzokhona

Question content: Onke ama {cheque account} ahambhisana ne {overdraft}
Explanation: i{Overdraft} uhlobo lwesivumelwano sesikweletu esihlelekile, okusho ukuthi kumele ukhwalifaye ukuyithola. Unga aplaya ukuyithola kodwa akukho siqiniseko

Question content: Ama{overdraft} aluhlobo lesikweletu eliyi {revolving credit}
Explanation: i{Overdraft} ihluka kuyi {revolving credit} ngoba ukwazi ukuyisebenzisa uma usuphelelwe yimali kuyi {account} kuphela

Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe ojwayele ukuyithola ngesivumelwano sesikweletu?
Explanation: Izimpahla ezifana ne fenisha nama TV zingathengwa ngesikweletu zikhohelwe ngama {instalment}. Uma usuzikhokhele, ziba ngezakho

Question content: Ukuvuma ukukhokhela usofa ngesikhathi esithile kuyini?
Explanation: Izimpahla ezifana ne fenisha nama TV zingathemngwa ngesikweletu zikhohelwe ngama {instalment}. Uma usuzikhokhele, ziba ngezakho

Question content: Uma izimpahla ezithuthekayo (kanjenge moto nefenisha) zithengiswa ngesikweletu, kujwayele ukuba yisiphi?
Explanation: Izimpahla ezifana ne fenisha nama TV zingathengwa ngesikweletu zikhohelwe ngama {instalment}. Uma usuzikhokhele, ziba ngezakho

Question content: Isikweletu esinjani isikweletu semoto?
Explanation: Ngesikweletu semoto, ikhokha imali ebekiwe ngenyanga kuze kuphele isikhathi esishiwo (kujwayele ukuba yiminyaka). Uma usukhokhile waqeda wabika ukuthi kuvalwe i{account}, imoto iba ngeyakho

Question content: Izinto ezifana namafriji nama {TV} ziyathengiswa yini ngesivumelwane sesikweletu na?
Explanation: Izimpahla ezithuthekayo kanjenge moto nefenisha zingathengwa ngesikweletu sesivumelwano se {instalment}. Uma usuzikhokhele ngokugcwele, leyo mpahla iba ngeyakho

Question content: Uma uthenga into nge {account} yesitolo ungena esivumelwanoni sokuthenga nge {instalment}?
Explanation: Ama {account} ezitolo ayisikweletu se {revolving credit} la ongayisebenzisa khona imali kuze kufike enanini eliyi {maximum}. Lesikweletu singahlala sivulekile waya waya. i{Instalment} iyaphela

Question content: Kuyenzeka yini ukuthi ungayikhokhi inzalo esikweletini sokuthenga nge {instalment}?
Explanation: Ukukhohela isikweletu se {instalment} kuhlukile ekukhokheleni ese {revovling credit} ngoba i{instalment} ifaka inzalo kusuka kwesikweletu

Question content: Esivumelwaneni sesikweletu, imali oyikhokha ngenyanga ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Instalment}, ebizwa nge {repayment}, igama ekubizwa ngalo ukukhokhela isikweletu (kahle kahle i{cost of credit}) njalo ngenyanga, uze usiqede isikweletu

Question content: Sikhokhelwa kanjani isikweletu nge {repayment}?
Explanation: Ngokujwayelekile esivumelwaneni sesikweletu, i{instalment} uyikhokha kayi 1 ngenyanga ngosuku lweholo noma maduzane nalo

Question content: i{{Repayment}} yimali oyikhokhayo ngenyanga ukukhokhela isikweletu?
Explanation: i{Instalment}, ebizwa nge {repayment}, igama ekubizwa ngalo ukukhokhela isikweletu (kahle kahle i{cost of credit}) njalo ngenyanga, uze usiqede isikweletu

Question content: Inani le {{repayment}} lijwayele ukushintsha ngenyanga
Explanation: Isivumelwano esihamba nenzalo e{fixed} asishintshi imali oyikhokhayo ({repayment}) ngokushintsha kwe {prime lending rate}. Uma sihamba nenzalo e{link}iwe, ama {repayment} angashintsha ngesikhathi

Question content: Isikhathi osithathayo ukukhokhela isivumelwano sesikweletu se {instalment} sibizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Payment term} isikhathi sokukhokhela isikweletu nge {instalment}. Uma ukhokha ngoba kushiwo (ungekho kuma {arrears}), isikweletu siphela uma usukhokhe imali yokugcina nge {instalment}

Question content: Ikalwa ngani i{{payment term}} ekuyisikhathi sokukhokhela isikweletu se {instalment}?
Explanation: i{Payment term} ekuyisikhathi sokukhokhela isikweletu sijwayele ukukalwa ngezinyanga. Ngokwesibonelo, isivumelwano sesikweletu se {instalment} singathi ukhokha R500 ezinyangeni ezingu 72

Question content: Ngokwenjwayelo, uma uthatha isikhathi eside ukukhokha isikweletu, ukhokha inzalo eningi
Explanation: Ngoba inzalo izala ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, ngenjwayelo uzokhokha kakhulu uma uthatha isikhathi eside ukukhokhela isikweletu uzokhokha inzalo eningi, kanjalo nasesikweletini sokuthenga nge {instalment}

Question content: i{{Payment term}} yezinyanga ezingu 36 isho ukuthi uzokhokha i{instalment} iminyaka engu 3
Explanation: Isivumelwano sika 36 {months} singu 3 {years}, esika 48 {months} ngu 4 {years], kanti esika 60 {months} singu 5 {years}

Question content: Isamba semali sonke ogcina usikhokhe esivumelwaneni sesikweletu sibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Ukubiza kwesikweletu okuyi {cost of credit} imali ogcina uyikhokhile kumkweletisi ngesikweletu osenzile. Sibalwa ungakasithathi, bese usikhokha kancane nge {instalment} size siphele

Question content: i{{Cost of credit}} isamba semali yonke oyikhokhayo uma ukhokhela isivumelwano sesikweletu nge {instalment}
Explanation: Ukubiza kwesikweletu okuyi {cost of credit} imali ogcina uyikhokhile kumkweletisi ngesikweletu osenzile. Sibalwa ungakasithathi, bese usikhokha kancane nge {instalment} size siphele

Question content: i{{Cost of credit}} iyisamba saziphi izimali?
Explanation: i{Cost of credit} isamba semali oyibolekile (noma inani othenge ngalo izinto) kanye nenzalo nezinye izimali zangenyanga zama {admin fees} nezimali zokuqala isikweletu ekuyi {initiation fee}

Question content: Iyakwazi yini i{{cost of credit}} ukuba ncane kune mali othenge ngayo noma oyibolekile?
Explanation: i{Cost of credit} isamba semali oyibolekile (noma inani othenge ngalo izinto) kanye nenzalo nezinye izimali zangenyanga zama {admin fees} nezimali zokuqala isikweletu ekuyi {initiation fee}

Question content: Yini eyenza i{{cost of credit}} ibe nkulu kunenani othenge ngalo esikweletini noma inani olibolekile?
Explanation: i{Cost of credit} isamba semali oyibolekile (noma inani othenge ngalo izinto) kanye nenzalo nezinye izimali zangenyanga zama {admin fees} nezimali zokuqala isikweletu ekuyi {initiation fee}

Question content: Uku aplayela isikweltu esihlelekile kuthembela kuphi?
Explanation: Ukuthola isikweletu ({approval}) kuncika enanini lemali olibolekile, ukuthi uyakhona yini ukuyibuyisela yonke leyo mali ngama {instalment}, nokuthi unegama elinjani ekukhokheni izikweletu

Question content: Ukukhona kwakho ukubuyisela imali yesikweletu oyisebenzisile kubizwa ngani phecelezi?
Explanation: Ezimalini, ukukhona ({affordability}) kwakho ubuyisela imali yesikweletu oyibolekile. Uma unganayo i{affordability} eyanele, angeke ukwazi ukubuyisela imali nge {instalment}

Question content: Amathuba akho okukhokhela kahle isikweletu osithathile abizwa ngani?
Explanation: Ukukhona kwakho ukukhokhela isikweletu okubizwa nge {creditworthiness} isibalo sokukhona kwakho ukubuyisela imali yezikweletu, okuncike ekubuyiseleni kwakho imali yezinye izikweletu ({credit record})

Question content: Abakweletisi baphoqeke ngokomthetho ukubheka ukukhona kwakho ukukhokha isikweletu (i{creditworthiness ne affordability})
Explanation: Abakweletisi kumele berejiste ne {NCR} ukuze basebenze ngokomthetho. Ingxenye yalokhu ukuthi beqiniseke ukuthi uyakhona ukukhokha imali yesikweletu ngokwe {creditworthiness} ne {affordability}

Question content: Abakweletisi abahlelekile babheka umlando wokukhokha kwakho, ababheki i{affordability}
Explanation: Abakweletisi kumele berejiste ne {NCR} ukuze basebenze ngokomthetho. Ingxenye yalokhu ukuthi beqiniseke ukuthi uyakhona ukukhokha imali yesikweletu ngokwe {creditworthiness} ne {affordability}

Question content: Indlena elula yokuchaza i{{affordability}} kuyini?
Explanation: i{{Affordability}} iyikukhona kwakho ukukhokhela isikweletu. Ukuba ne {affordability} kusho ukuthi unemali eyisipele ngenyanga ongakhokha ngayo i{debit order} noma i{instalment}

Question content: Yini kwezibaliwe esho ukuthi uyakhona ukukhokhela isikweletu se {instalment}?
Explanation: i{{Affordability}} iyikukhona kwakho ukukhokhela isikweletu. Ukuba ne {affordability} kusho ukuthi unemali eyisipele ngenyanga ongakhokha ngayo i{debit order} noma i{instalment}

Question content: Benza ini {{abakweletisi}} ukuze bebone ukuthi ungakhona yini ukukhokha imali yesikweletu?
Explanation: Uma u aplayela isikweletu, umkweletisi engadinga ukwazi iholo lakho nezindleko zakho kuze ezothola ukuthi usalelwa malini ekupheleni kwenyanga. Ilokhu umkweletisi abheka ngakho i{affordability} yakho

Question content: Abakweletisi bajwayele ukubheka nini ukuthi uyakhona yini ukukhokha isikweletu?
Explanation: Ukubheka i{affordability} kwenzeka uma u aplayela isikweletu esihlelekile. Eku aplayeni, uzomele ukusho iholo lakho kanye nezindleko ozikhokhelayo kuze i{affordability} yakho izobalwa

Question content: Abakweletisi badinga miphi imininingwane ukuthola ukuthi uyakhona ukukhokhela isikweletu na?
Explanation: Abakweletisi badinga ukwazi ukuthi uhola malini nokuthi unezindleko zamalini. Kusuka lapho, bayabona ukuthi ungakhona yini ukukhokha isikweletu noma cha uma bekuboleka imali

Question content: Iziphi izindleko ekumele uzibale uma wenza isicelo sesikwetu?
Explanation: Abakweletisi abakwazi ukubona ukuthi ungakhona ukukhokhela isikweletu uma bengazazi izindleko zakho zonke. Ingakho kubalulekile ukusho izindleko zakho uma u aplaya

Question content: Uma i{affordability} yakho, ekuyikukhona kwakho ukukhokha, ingekho phezulu kakhulu, isicelo sesikweletu angeke siphumelele
Explanation: i{{Affordability}} iyikukhona kwakho ukukhokhela isikweletu. Ukungabi ne {affordability} kusho ukuthi awunayo imali eyisipele ngenyanga ongakhokha ngayo i{debit order} noma i{instalment} yesikweletu

Question content: Kuyini isidingo sokuthi abakweletisi bazi ukuthi usebenzisa imali kanjani ngenyanga?
Explanation: Abakweletisi badinga ukwazi ukuthi uhola malini nokuthi unezindleko zamalini. Kusuka lapho, bayabona ukuthi ungakhona yini ukukhokha isikweletu noma cha uma bekuboleka imali

Question content: Indlela yokubheka i{affordability} yakho imali esalayo uma usukhokhele izindleko ({discretionary income})
Explanation: Abakweletisi badinga ukwazi ukuthi uhola malini nokuthi unezindleko zamalini. Uma imali yeholo yanele kanti zingeningi izindleko, maningi amathuba okuthola isikweletu

Question content: Uma uhola imali eningi, uba ne {affordability} enkulu
Explanation: i{Affordability} iphathelene nemali esalayo eholweni uma usukhiphe imali yezindleko. Ukuhola kakhulu akwenzi ube ne {affordability} ephezulu uma unezindleko eziningi

Question content: Ukuhola kancane kuyigaranti ye {affordability} ephansi
Explanation: i{Affordability} iphathelene nemali esalayo eholweni uma usukhiphe imali yezindleko. Kuyenzeka ukuthi uhole kancane kunomunye kodwa ube ne {affordability} encono ngoba unezindleko eziphansi

Question content: Kulungile yini ukuthi umkweletisi engayibheki i{affordability} yakho?
Explanation: Abakweletisi abahlelekile abarejistile futhi abalandela imithetho ye {National Credit Act} kumele babheke i{affordability} yakho bengakakuniki isikweletu osiaplayele

Question content: Ungenza ini ukukhuphula i{affordability} yakho?
Explanation: Uma ukhokhela uqeda enye yama {account} onawo, uba nemali engasakhokheli isikweletu, eyenza kunyuke i{affordability} yakho

Question content: Ukukhokha yonke imali oyikweletayo ngesikweletu esiyi 1 kungenza ini?
Explanation: Uma ukhokhela uqeda enye yama {account} onawo, uba nemali engasakhokheli isikweletu, eyenza kunyuke i{affordability} yakho

Question content: Uma ukhokhela uqeda i{account} yesitolo sezimpahla, uyanyuka yini i{affordability} yakho?
Explanation: Uma ukhokela uqeda enye yama {account} onawo, uba nemali engasakhokheli isikweletu, eyenza kunyuke i{affordability} yakho

Question content: i{{Affordability}} yakho ingaba ncane uma ungenayo ini?
Explanation: Uma uneholo elingangeni njalo ngenjwayelo, kungaba nzima ukuthi abakweletisi bazi ukuthi ungakhokha imali ethile njalo ngenyanga

Question content: i{Affordability} yakho yehla ngomzuzu uthatha isikweletu
Explanation: Uma uthatha isikweletu esisha, unyusa imali oyikhokhela izikweletu, okunciphisa i{discretionary income} ekuyimali esala usukhokhele izikweletu. Uma iholo lingakhuphuki, une {affordability} encane

Question content: Uma une {affordability} ephansi, maningi amathuba okuthola isikweletu uma wenza isicelo
Explanation: Akuhambi kanjalo. Uma i{affordability} yakho incane, mancane amathuba okunikezwa isikweletu ngesicelo

Question content: Amathuba akho okukhokhela imali yesikweletu osibolekile abizwa ngani?
Explanation: Umkweletisi uzofuna ukuthola ukuthi uthembhekile na ekukhokheleni izikweletu ngesikhathi ngokubheka ukuthi ukhokha kanjani ezinye izikweletu ozithathile. Lokhu yi {creditworthiness}

Question content: Ngokwezimali ezihlelekile, i{creditworthiness} incike kuphi?
Explanation: Igama lakho ezikweletini umlando wakho nokukhokhela kwakho izikweletu ngokusho kwabakweletisi abake bakubolekisela. Lokhu yi {proof} yomlando wakho

Question content: Irekhodi lakho lezikweletu lisetshenziswa ukuthola i{creditworthiness} yakho
Explanation: Igama lakho ezikweletini umlando wakho nokukhokhela kwakho izikweletu ngokusho kwabakweletisi abake bakubolekisela. Lokhu yi {proof} yomlando wakho

Question content: Uma isicelo sesikweletu siphumelela kusho ukuthi umkweletisi ujabulile ngerekhodi lakho lezikweletu
Explanation: Uma irekhodi lakho lezikweletu linamachashaza amaningi, umkweletisi engakunqabela isicelo sesikweletu. Uma irekhodi lakho linesinqumo sasenkantolo, kumele ngokomthetho isicelo sakho senqatshelwe

Question content: Irekhodi lakho lezikweletu lijwayele ukuvezwa iziphi izinto ezingu 2?
Explanation: Amahhovisi okukweletisa ajwayele ukuveza irekhodi lakho lezikweletu ngeriphothi yezikweletu (umlando wokukhokha kwakho) nesko ({credit score}) okuyi nombholo esho amandla eriphothi lezikweletu zakho

Question content: Iriphothi lakho ({credit report}) ne {credit score} izinto ezikala ini?
Explanation: Amahhovisi okukweletisa ajwayele ukuveza irekhodi lakho lezikweletu ngeriphothi yezikweletu (umlando wokukhokha kwakho) nesko ({credit score}) okuyi nombholo esho amandla eriphothi lezikweletu zakho

Question content: Irekhodi lakho lidlala indima enkulu ekutholeni kwakho izikweletu esisha
Explanation: Irekhodi lakho lisho ukuthi uyathembeka ekuthatheni nasekukhokheni izikweletu ngokusho kwesivumelwano. Uma unerekhodi elibi, amathuba okuthola isikweletu esisha mancane

Question content: Uma ujwayele ukungakhokhi ezikweletini, lokhu angeke kuthinte irekhodi lakho ({credit record})
Explanation: Ukungakhokhi imali ngisho kayi 1 akubizi ngenzalo kuphela. Kufaka ichashaza erekhodini lakho okungathinta amathuba akho okuthola isikweletu esisha.

Question content: Abakweletisi balithola kuphi irekhodi lakho ezikweletini?
Explanation: Amahhovisi ezikweletu ({credit bureaus}) amakhampani akoleka imininingwane yokukhokha izikweletu yabantu. Abakweletisi bathola lemininingwane ngomuntu ofaka isicelo sesikweletu kubo

Question content: Ubani owenza futhi oshintsha amarekhodi ezikweletu abantu?
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} aqoqa imininingwane yokukhokha kwabantu izikweletukubo bonke abakweletisi abanenhlangano nabo. Basebenzisa lemininingwane ukwenza amariphothi abantu ngabanye

Question content: Ikhampani eqoqa ama riphothi omlando wezikweletu zakho ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} aqoqa imininingwane yokukhokha kwabantu izikweletu kubo bonke abakweletisi abanenhlangano nabo. Basebenzisa lemininingwane ukwenza amariphothi abantu ngabanye

Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe ekuyisibonelo se {credit bureau}?
Explanation: Zonke izinkampani ezibaliwe ziyizibonelo zama {credit bureau}. Abakweletisi bangasebenzisa noma imaphi ama {credit bureau} uma lawo ma {bureau} berejistie ne {NCR}

Question content: Ama {credit bureau} athola imininingwane yakho yokukhokha kuphi na?
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} awacwaningi abantu. Athola imininingwane yawo kubanye abakweletisi bese beyawahlela khona ikhastoma lizoba nefayela lalo

Question content: Ama{credit bureau} ajwayele ukuletha irekhodi lakho ngesimo esinjani?
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} ajwayele ukuletha irekhodi lakho lezikweletu njengombiko osho umlando wakho wokukhokha kanye nenombholo eyi sko esiyinombholo esisho ukukhokha kwakho

Question content: Ama{credit bureau} ayizi nkampani ezizimele angasebenzi ngokuthanda abakweletisi
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} awamile namuntu. Wona nje abika imininingwane anayo avela kubakweletisi (noma enkantolo uma unesinqumo)

Question content: Ama{credit bureau} asebenzisa imininingwane yomlando wakho eyiqiniso engajiki ukwenza amariphothi
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} awamile namuntu. Wona nje abika imininingwane anayo avela kubakweletisi (noma enkantolo uma unesinqumo)

Question content: Ingabe ama{credit bureau} ayizikhungo zika hulumeni na?
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} ayizinkampani ezangasese ({private company}). Yize belandela umthetho futhi bebhekwa yi {National Credit Regulatory}, akusiso izikhungo zikahulumeni

Question content: Ama{credit bureau} iyiminyango ({departments}) ema {bank}
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} ayizinkampani ezangasese ({private company}). Yize amabhange ebika kubo, bazimele futhi abangeni ngaphansi kwama {bank} athile

Question content: Ingabe umuntu ofuna ukubona irekhodi lakho lezikweletu udinga imvume yakho na?
Explanation: Zonke izikhungo nabantu bengafuna ukubona irekhodi lakho lezikweletu ({credit record}) ngokusemthethweni, kodwa badinga imvume yakho ukubona lelo rekhodi

Question content: Abakweletisi kuphela abangathola i{credit report} lakho
Explanation: Abakweletisi abasemthethweni bangawuthola umbiko wezikweletu zakho ({credit report}) noma yinini uma u aplayela isikweletu. Wena nawe ungazicelela i{credit report} yakho kuma {credit bureau}

Question content: Uthola amariphothi mahala awungaki ngonyaka?
Explanation: Ungathola i{credit report} ekungumbiko weikweletu zakho mahala kuyi {credit bureau} ebhalisile. Ungayicela kaningi, kodwa angeke kube mahala

Question content: Umthetho uthi wonke umuntu engathola iriphothi eyi 1 ngonyaka mahala kuma {credit bureau} onke
Explanation: Ungathola i{credit report} ekungumbiko wezikweletu zakho mahala kuyi {credit bureau} ebhalisile. Ungayicela kaningi, kodwa angeke kube mahala

Question content: Uzokhokha njalo uma ufuna iriphothi lakho lezikweletu
Explanation: Ungathola i{credit report} ekungumbiko weikweletu zakho mahala kuyi {credit bureau} ebhalisile. Ungayicela kaningi, kodwa angeke kube mahala

Question content: Ukucela ukubona iriphothi lakho kungenza ulawule izikweletu zakho kancono
Explanation: Angeke wazi ukuthi abakweletisi bakubona kanjani ngokwezikweletu uma ungayibonanga i{credit report} yakho. Kuhlakaniphile futhi ukwazi ukuthi irekhodi lakho lezikweletu limi kahle na

Question content: Iriphothi lezikweletu ({credit report}) lisho ini?
Explanation: Ungabika isikhalazo ngemininingwane yakho yokukhokhela izikweletu, kanye nama {arrears} nezinye izinto eziphathelene nokukhokha kwakho izikweletu

Question content: Iliphi elinye igama lokusho i{credit report}?
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} aphethe ulwazi lokukhokha kwakho izikweletu ngeriphothi yezikweletu ephethe umlando wakho nokukhokha. Uma ungakaze uthathe isikweletu, angeke ube nomlando

Question content: Iyiphi kwezibaliwe engavela kuyi riphothi lakho (phecelezi kuyi {credit report})?
Explanation: Ama {account} okuthiwa adifolthiwe ({defaulted}) angama {account} la onama {arrears} adlula u 3 {months}, izinqumo zenkantolo, kanye nala izicelo zakho zingaphumelelanga khona yizinto ezithinta igama irekhodi lakho

Question content: Ngenjwayelo. abakweletisi babika nini kuma {credit bureau}?
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} ajwayele ukuriphotha ukukhokha kwamakhasimende njalo ezinsukwini ezingu 30. Yingakho igama lakho nerekhodi lakho kushintsha njalo ngezinsuku ezingu 30

Question content: Uma kunemali ongayikhokhanga, kuthinta igama lakho ne {credit report} yakho kabi
Explanation: Ukungakhokhi ngisho inyanga eyodwa kunemiphumela engekho mihle ngaphezu kwezinzalo. Kuyabhalwa egameni lakho, kuvela eriphothini yakho

Question content: Imininingwane kuyi {credit report} yakho ivela kubakweletisi une {account} nabo?
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} ajwayele ukuriphotha ukukhokha kwamakhasimende njalo ezinsukwini ezingu 30. Yingakho igama lakho nerekhodi lakho kushintsha njalo ngezinsuku ezingu 30

Question content: Iriphothi lakho lisho ukuthi ukhokha kahle kanjani izikweletu
Explanation: Iriphothi lakho lisho ukuthi uthembekile na ekukhokheleni isikweletu ovumile ukusibuyisela. Uma izinto erekhodini lakho zithi awukhokhi kahle, mancane amathuba okuthola isikweletu esisha

Question content: Inombolo esho amandla eriphothi lakho ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Credit score} yakho incike em'niningwaneni ekuyi riphothi yakho yezikweletu. i{Score} esiphezulu sisho une {credit report} enhle, okusho ukuthi ukhokha imali ngesikhathi

Question content: Yini kwezibaliwe engathathwa njengesifinyezo ({snapshot}) se {credit report} yakho?
Explanation: i{Credit score} yakho incike em'niningwaneni ekuyi riphothi yakho yezikweletu. i{Score} esiphezulu sisho une {credit report} enhle, okusho ukuthi ukhokha imali ngesikhathi

Question content: i{Credit score} yakho incike kuphi?
Explanation: i{Credit score} yakho incike em'niningwaneni ekuyi riphothi yakho yezikweletu. i{Score} esiphezulu sisho une {credit report} enhle, okusho ukuthi ukhokha imali ngesikhathi

Question content: i{Credit score} yakho ibuyekezwa nini?
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} ajwayele ukuriphotha ukukhokha kwamakhasimende njalo ezinsukwini ezingu 30. Yingakho igama lakho nerekhodi lakho kushintsha njalo ngenyanga

Question content: i{{Credit score}} yakho iveza ukukhokha kwakho izikweletu
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} ajwayele ukuriphotha ukukhokha kwamakhasimende njalo ezinsukwini ezingu 30 okungaveza ushintsho eriphothini yakho yezikweletu. Uma ungakhokhi inyanga, kuzongena erekhodini lakho ngenyanga ezayo

Question content: Ukungakhokhi akuyishintshi i{credit score} yakho
Explanation: Ama {credit bureau} ajwayele ukuriphotha ukukhokha kwamakhasimende njalo ezinsukwini ezingu 30 okungaveza ushintsho eriphothini yakho. Uma ungakhokhi inyanga, kungena erekhodini ngenyanga ezayo

Question content: Uma i{credit score} yakho iphansi, kusho ukuthi kunezinkinga ngendlela osebenzisa ngayo imali
Explanation: i{Credit score} yakho incike emininingwaneni eseriphothini yakho. Uma i{score} sakho sehla ngamaphuzu, kusho ukuthi khona into engeyinhle ebikiwe kuyi {credit bureau}

Question content: i{Credit score} yakho ayihlangene nomlando wakho wokukhokha
Explanation: i{Credit score} yakho incike emniningwaneni kuyi riphothi lakho lezikweletu ({credit report}), okungumlando wakho nokukhokha kwakho kwezikweletu ozithathile

Question content: i{Credit score} yakho ihlanganisa amandla e{credit report} yakho
Explanation: i{Credit score} yakho incike em'niningwaneni ekuyi riphothi yakho yezikweletu. i{Score} esiphezulu sisho une {credit report} enhle, okusho ukuthi ukhokha imali ngesikhathi

Question content: Usengaba nayo i{{credit score enkulu}} uma {credit report} yakho ibuthakathaka
Explanation: i{Credit score} yakho incike em'niningwaneni ekuyi riphothi yakho. i{Score} esiphezulu sisho une {credit report} enhle, kanti esiphansi sisho ukuthi iriphothi lakho alikho lihle
